description:
spec: add () to method calls in examples

Since p.M is rejected (must call methods), use p.M(),
to keep the examples compiling.

Fixes issue 4441.

spec: add () to method calls in examples

Since p.M is rejected (must call methods), use p.M(),
to keep the examples compiling.

Fixes issue 4441.
